input.sentences: the family walked around and looked at the buildings .
they stopped and posed for pictures before going forward on their journey
they saw a lake and decided to take a closer look
they walked over the bridge to get a closer look at the ducks
they ended their day with a game at the park . overall it was a fun day
output.sentences: My brother posed for a picture.
We got closer to the lake.
